title: Crypto Tracker
description: Crypto Tracker is an application that allows users to see what cryptocurrencies are being traded on the market, track their current price and price over time, and add specific currencies to their 'portfolio' allowing them to easily monitor only those currencies they are interested in.  To test out the app you can create a new account, or use username 'test' and password 'test'.

title: Maven Banking Application
description: The Maven Banking Application is a full stack Java web application that simulates an application used by a bank to manage customers and accounts, as well as provide a user interface for customers and employees to interact with the system.
tech: Java, Maven, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, Axios, HTML, CSS

title: Final Fantasy XIV Gathering Companion
description: Final Fantasy XIV Gathering Companion is a full-stack React application with authentication that allows users to see the in-game time, search for gatherable items, and create alarms letting them know when items are available to be gathered.  To test out the app you can either register as a new user or use the email 'test@test.com' and password 'password'
tech: React, JavaScript, Node, Express, MySQL, Axios, Jest, Cookie-Session, Moment.js, HTML, CSS

title: Busi
description: Busi is a full-stack application designed for a small business enabling them to manage customers, sales orders, invoices, and payments
tech: JavaScript, Node, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Jest

title: Brew Cruze
description: Brew Cruze is an app in which the user enters a number of cities, then the app generates a MapQuest route with turn-by-turn directions, and also generates a list of breweries near each of those cities.  The user then selects the breweries they would like to visit, then a new route is generated passing through each of the breweries along with the cities

title: Weather Dashboard
description: The Weather Dashboard allows the user to search for a city and display the current weather conditions there, along with a 5-day forecast.  Previous cities the user has searched for are saved in local storage, and a button is generated for each previous search allowing the user to easily get the weather for that city again
